title: Romancero
overview: Jord√°n and Cornelia are two helpless kids who, in the dead of night, are trying to escape the infuriated people who accuse them of murder. Terrified and fearing for their lives, they'll take care of each other and do everything in their power not to get caught by two violent officers: Teodoro and Sorroche. In their escape, they will also try to avoid supernatural dangers they find along the way.
